item.title: Here are the best AirPods deals you can get right now
item.description:
If you know where to look, you can often score discounts on Apple’s ever-popular AirPods. Since Apple launched the third-gen AirPods at the end of 2021, we’ve seen the starting price of the second-gen, entry-level model consistently dip below $100. And now that the second-gen AirPods Pro have been on the market for nearly two years, we’re also seeing their price fall more often, too. We’re even seeing great deals land on the updated AirPods Pro with USB-C.

Here, we’ve curated the best deals currently available on each model, including the entry-level AirPods, the AirPods Pro, the third-gen AirPods, and the AirPods Max.

The best AirPods (second-gen) deals

In 2021, Apple lowered the list price of the second-gen AirPods — now the...

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Sheena Vasani

item.title: The Pixel 8 Pro has hit an all-time low ahead of Google’s next hardware event
item.description:
Google’s next Pixel hardware event is less than two weeks away, which, in turn, means the Pixel 9 lineup is nearly upon us. That being said, you don’t need to wait for the debut of Google’s next handset on August 13th if you want a future-proofed Android phone chockful of premium specs and newfangled AI capabilities. That’s because the Pixel 8 Pro — Google’s current high-end flagship — is on sale at Amazon and Best Buy with 128GB of storage starting at $699 ($300 off), an all-time low.

If the recent rumor mill is to be believed, Google’s next pro-grade smartphone will feature several distinct design changes and a modest performance boost thanks to its G4 Tensor chip. But the third-gen chipset in the Pixel 8 and 8 Pro is still plenty...

Continue reading…

item.title: Character.AI CEO Noam Shazeer returns to Google
item.description:
In a big move, Character.AI co-founder and CEO CEO Noam Shazeer is returning to Google after leaving the company in October 2021 to found the a16z-backed startup. In his previous stint, Shazeer spearheaded the team of researchers that built LaMDA (Language Model for Dialogue Applications), a language model that was used for conversational AI tools. Character.AI co-founder Daniel […]

item.title: US justice department sues TikTok, accusing the company of violating a children's online privacy law
item.description: The Justice Department sued TikTok, accusing it of violating children's online privacy laws and breaking a previous settlement with the FTC. The lawsuit focused on allegations that TikTok collected personal information from children under 13 without parental consent. TikTok's failure to comply with COPPA led to millions of children accessing the regular app, exposing them to adult content.
